name: Aleksandr Cherednichenko
previewText: I am a talented front-end developer with 2 years of commercial experience, last of which I have been using Vue 3, a state-of-the-art framework for building web user interfaces. I have a showcase of amazing web applications that I have built. I am proficient in HTML, SCSS, JavaScript and other web technologies. I also have a flair for design and base proficiency with graphic design applications (e.g., Figma). I was born in Magnitogorsk, but I moved to Saint Petersburg to pursue my passion in this field. Currently, I am living in Thailand and looking for remote work.

useful.1: I can be a valuable asset for potential employers because:
useful.2: I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality web applications with Vue 3
useful.3: I have excellent communication and collaboration skills
useful.4: I have a keen interest in learning new technologies and best practices
useful.5: I have a flexible and adaptable mindset

work1.name: AT-Work
work1.description: Компания которая занимаеться разработкой сервиса, который включает в себя поиск и найм специалистов, размещение объявлений о продаже товаров, а также подбор исполнителей услуг

work2.name: Reelmotion Games
work2.description: Компания специализирующаяся на разработке уникальных гемблинг проектов для онлайна, а так же на социальные проекты и i-gaming индустрию
